dt.t: As far as she's concerned, it's great to see men acknowledge, whether explicitly or {wi}subconsciously{/wi}, that it's OK to want to care about looking nice, and that wearing something you look good in can make you feel better.

If something that you perceive arouses in you a painful emotion, you may {wi}subconsciously{/wi} suppress or deny your perception in order to avoid the unbearable pain, even though the practical results of ignoring your perception may prove ultimately disastrous.

shortdef: in a subconscious manner : without conscious awareness
